tiers.name: Critical
tiers.description: Neon pink — Core lifeline. Must flow. If this blocks, the Hive stalls.

tiers.name: Active
tiers.description: Gold glow — Current focus. Design, build, test, ship. Heavy lift zone.

tiers.name: Supporting
tiers.description: Signal green — On the periphery. Functioning or partially in progress, but not top priority. Monitored, not driven.

tiers.name: Dormant
tiers.description: Electric blue — Paused intentionally. Safe to ignore until reactivated.

tiers.name: Archived
tiers.description: Dim slate — Sunset or deprecated. Historical value only.
